alert.note: Alert for Butler; Montgomery; Preble; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN PREBLE, EASTERN BUTLER, NORTHERN WARREN AND SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Trenton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Middletown, Fairfield, Mason, Miamisburg, Lebanon, Springboro, Sharonville, Monroe, Trenton, Franklin, Springdale, Carlisle, South Middletown, West Chester, Waynesville, Seven Mile, Williamsdale, Olde West Chester and Four Bridges. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 26 and 28. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
